title: Has anyone achieved MRICS status working in an infrastructure company like HCC, L&T, and Afcons? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have many members who are from infrastructure companies like HCC, L&T and Simplex. These candidates come from different pathways (specialism areas) like QS & Construction, Project Management, and Infrastructure. If you are looking to become a member in the infrastructure pathway, please go to the RICS website and refer to the Infrastructure pathway. For your information, RICS raises the professionalism of our qualified professionals who serve as leaders in the design, construction, operations, management and valuation of infrastructure around the world.
